name: The Paint Gunner
storyline: You work in a paint factory and scientists accidentally invented 2 special paints. Orange makes you move faster and green makes you bounce. The company hosted a celebration in the party room, everyone was having a great time. Until suddenly, a random worker pressed the "DO NOT PRESS" button. That caused some containers that contain toxic chemicals to explode, flooding the factory that caused everyone in the party room to be trapped. However, only one person, which is you, was at the other side of the factory. So you have the opportunity to save all of your co-workers by using your paint gun that contains special abilities to help get through levels throughout the game.
summary: Everybody in your factory is trapped inside the party room. It is up to you to save them all - by using your super cool paint gun of course!
